survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and effectiveness with current digital workspace ergonomics, including hardware, software, and environmental factors impacting productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current workstation setup (e.g., desk, chair, monitor)?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to capture nuanced responses. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled for accessibility.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current workstation setup (e.g., desk, chair, monitor)?
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital workspace tools do you use daily? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture tool usage accurately. Include an 'Other' option for uncommon tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital workspace tools do you use daily? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort (e.g., eye strain, back pain) while working at your digital workspace?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents must answer this question.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to identify pain points.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort (e.g., eye strain, back pain) while working at your digital workspace?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your digital workspace setup?
